titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Population Council records, Photographs FA092

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-21 00:37:44 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for researchd. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be closed to research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be closed to researchers at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/Head of Reference.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised entirely of photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Students, Lectures, Villagers, Children, Health, Meetings, PC Staff, medical instruments, Research Center building, floorplan, maps

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Students, lectures, industry, machines, Dinners, Tours
